remarks: The (smallest) structure representing a _trivial group_.  According to Wikipedia ("Trivial group", 28-Apr-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trivial_group ) "In mathematics, a _trivial group_ is a group consisting of a single element.  All such groups are isomorphic, so one often speaks of _the_ trivial group.  The single element of the trivial group is the identity element". (Contributed by AV, 28-Apr-2019.)
